subject: Warranty claim - EcoBreeze handle cracked
body:
Hello HairTech,

I purchased the EcoBreeze dryer on June 15, 2025 from Target. I love the eco-friendly design!

Unfortunately, the bamboo handle has developed a crack along its length. I haven't dropped it or mishandled it - the crack just appeared.

I'm concerned it might break completely. Serial: EB-2025-23456.

I still have my receipt. Happy to recycle the defective unit.

Marcus Brown
567 Green Lane
Boulder, CO 80301
720-555-0134

metadata.reason: Purchase date June 2025 is outside 3-month warranty window (over 6 months old)
